founders.name: Alex Grant
founders.title: Co-founder & Creative Director
founders.bio: With a keen eye for aesthetics and a decade of experience in brand strategy, Alex leads our creative vision. He believes that great design is not just about looking good, but about creating a lasting emotional connection.

founders.name: Jordan Lee
founders.title: Co-founder & Technical Lead
founders.bio: Jordan is the engineering powerhouse behind Kryve. Obsessed with performance and clean code, she architects the robust, scalable, and cutting-edge solutions that bring our creative visions to life.
